shortDescription: Help Bella get the surgery she needs!
longDescription: Bella is a playful and loving dog who needs surgery to correct a hip dysplasia. Your donations will go directly towards her medical bills and post-surgery care.
creator: mh7266391@gmail.com

longDescription: Whiskers, a sweet and friendly cat, was injured in an accident. She requires extensive treatment and rehabilitation. Your support will help her get back on her feet and find a loving home.
creator: mh7266391@gmail.com

longDescription: Charlie, a brave and affectionate dog, has been diagnosed with cancer. He needs chemotherapy and ongoing treatment to survive. Your generous donations will help cover his medical expenses and give him a fighting chance.
creator: mh7266391@gmail.com
